segments.text: How long have you been married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been married for three years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many people are there in your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are four people in my family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who are the members of your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My husband , my mother-in-law , my daughter and I .
segments.speaker: S2
